DOC.brief_summary: Branded bupropion hydrochloride product include ZYBAN WELLBUTRIN range approve treatment smoke cessation depressive disorder respectively . The Risk Evaluation Mitigation Strategy ( REMS ) ZYBAN initially approve 2010 consist Medication Guide timetable REMS assessment submission 18 month , 3 year 7 year date initial approval REMS . The present study 7-year REMS assessment evaluate subject ' understand potential serious risk neuropsychiatric adverse event associate use ZYBAN , WELLBUTRIN , WELLBUTRIN SR , WELLBUTRIN XL . The assessment 20-minutes Knowledge , Attitudes Behavior ( KAB ) survey conduct among approximately 125 subject currently use fill prescription brand bupropion product smoking cessation within 6 month prior survey administration . ZYBAN , WELLBUTRIN , WELLBUTRIN SR , WELLBUTRIN XL register trade mark GSK group company .
